description: The maximum_unused_productive_password_lifetime parameter in SAP HANA specifies the number of days after which a password expires if the user has not logged on.

queries.name: q_password_policy_maximum_unused_productive_password_lifetime
queries.sql: SELECT VALUE FROM M_PASSWORD_POLICY where PROPERTY = 'maximum_unused_productive_password_lifetime'

actions.description: The parameter maximum_unused_productive_password_lifetime is set greater than the default recommended value of 365. The parameter is a significant security feature that helps to protect your system from unauthorized access. It helps in reducing the risk of compromised accounts due to prolonged password inactivity.

references: SAP Note 3230381 - What are the different parameter options available to control password policy in HANA database?,https://me.sap.com/notes/3230381
